ingredients.content: 300 g pak choi or other green vegetables, cut in strips (see tip)

preparations.content: Place garlic cloves and extra virgin olive oil in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add pak choi, salt and black pepper and stir-fry <b>5 min/120°C//speed <b>. Serve immediately.
